definition: devoted to a cause or party, a pike with a long tapering double-edged blade with lateral projections
details:
adjective
- devoted to a cause or party
= synonyms: partizan
noun
- a pike with a long tapering double-edged blade with lateral projections
= synonyms: partizan
- an ardent and enthusiastic supporter of some person or activity
= synonyms: partizan, enthusiast
- a fervent and even militant proponent of something
= synonyms: zealot, drumbeater
